text: The 13th congressional district of Pennsylvania is a congressional district in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania. The district has all of Adams, Bedford, Blair, Cambria, Franklin, Fulton, Huntingdon, Juniata, Mifflin, and Perry counties. It also includes slivers of Cumberland and Somerset counties. Republican John Joyce has represented the district since 2019. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of Pennsylvania
title: Pennsylvania's 13th congressional district
